instructions:
Finely roll about 30 graham crackers to obtain 1 2/3 cups of crumbs. Pour crumbs into a bowl and add
sugar and softened butter. Blend well with fingers, fork or pastry blender. Pour mixture into 9-inch pie plate
and spread around to form shell. Set an 8-inch pie plate on top of crumbs and press firmly on bottom and
sides of the 9-inch plate. Remove smaller plate and bake in 375-degree oven for 8 minutes. Cool and fill
with favorite chilled pie filling.
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups graham cracker crumbs (1 pkg. + 4 dbl crackers)
name: Graham Cracker Pie Crust
